text: Héctor Rodríguez (born 2 April 1936) is a Colombian equestrian. He competed in the individual dressage event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Colombia Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Equestrians at the 1971 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Colombia Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian
title: Héctor Rodríguez (equestrian)
